{"id":587183958,"lang":"python","lang_name":"Python","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1636923158,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"92 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/587183958/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"14.3 MB","code":"class Solution(object):\n    def validPalindrome(self, s):\n        \"\"\"\n        :type s: str\n        :rtype: bool\n        \"\"\"\n        l = 0\n        r = len(s)-1\n        while(l<r):\n            if s[l]==s[r]:\n                l+=1\n                r-=1\n            else:\n                return self.isPalin(s[l:r]) or self.isPalin(s[l+1:r+1])\n        return True\n    \n    def isPalin(self,s):\n        return s==s[::-1]","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false}
